description: MFB-617: Update expected values after adding unemployment income to irs_gross_income

updates.notes: MFB-617: Updated for unemployment in AGI. 3 children, $52,800 AGI triggers phase-out.
updates.reason: Unemployment income ($2,400/year) now included in irs_gross_income per 26 USC ยง 85. Higher AGI increases EITC phase-out.

updates.notes: MFB-617: 20% of federal EITC ($2,952). Reduced due to unemployment in AGI.
updates.reason: IL EITC is 20% of federal EITC. Federal EITC reduced from $3,848 to $2,952.

updates.notes: MFB-617: 20% of IL EITC ($590). 2 children under 12 qualify.
updates.reason: IL CTC is 20% of IL EITC. IL EITC reduced from $769 to $590.
